articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Google and Samsung join forces to make it easier to sync fitness data between apps - The Verge
articles.description: Google has partnered with Samsung on Health Connect, an API and platform that makes it easier for developers to share users’ data across different apps and devices.
articles.content:
Health Connect is a single hub for health and fitness data
